articles.description: The Halo Code is a guide for schools and workplaces to protect natural hair and prevent discrimination.
articles.content:
By Manish PandeyNewsbeat reporter
image copyrightThe Halo Collective
image captionKatiann says people making comments about black people's hair "can really knock us down"
